question: Which Technology Major has recently acquired ‘Fitbit’ fitness application?
explanation:
Google has completed its USD 2.1 billion acquisition of fitness-gadget making firm Fitbit for approximately USD 2.1 billion.
This acquisition has come at the time when the US government regulators are pursuing an antitrust case. Google announced about this acquisition before 14 months, which will help expand the Tech Major’s presence in the market.
